alert.note: Alert for Habersham; Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 2:57AM EDT until October 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the upper 20s to lower 30s. * WHERE...The North Carolina foothills, the South Carolina mountains, and the northeast Georgia mountains. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until noon EDT today. For the second Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
